thread.section_title: Business & Financial News, U.S & International Breaking News | Reuters
thread.title: Ecuador confirms deaths of journalists kidnapped by Colombian rebels

author: Reuters Editorial
title: Ecuador confirms deaths of journalists kidnapped by Colombian rebels
text:
April 13, 2018 / 5:59 PM / Updated 4 minutes ago Ecuador confirms deaths of journalists kidnapped by Colombian rebels Reuters Staff 1 Min Read 
BOGOTA (Reuters) - Ecuador’s President Lenin Moreno said on Friday the country has information that confirms the deaths of two journalists and their driver, who were kidnapped last month by Colombian insurgents. 
“We haven’t received proof of life,” Moreno said in a televised statement. “And regrettably we have information that confirms the murder of the journalists.” Reporting by Julia Symmes Cobb; Editing by Dan Grebler
